title: Interpretation of a dream about riding an elevator with my ex-husband in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about riding an elevator with my ex-husband in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, riding an elevator in a dream could be a sign of goodness, and God knows the unseen. When you see the elevator broken down for a divorced woman, this may indicate that you are affected by the past, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees herself driving the elevator in a dream, she may This is evidence of compensation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing the death of my ex-husband and crying over him could lead to the worsening condition of her ex-husband. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of the symbol of pregnancy in a dream

preview.html: Through this article, you can learn about the interpretation of the symbol of pregnancy in a dream. In different cases, pregnancy in reality indicates the goodness and livelihood represented in the birth of children, and our Lord Almighty said in His Noble Book in Surat Al-Kahf (Money and children are the adornment of this world), so the acquisition of children It is the dream of many fathers and mothers, as it is one of the most beautiful blessings of God. This dream is one of the happy dreams for a married woman, but on the other hand, it can become disturbing for an unmarried girl, ambiguous for a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and eccentric for a man, and the interpretations of this dream differ for everyone. they. So what are the interpretations of this dream that dream interpreters indicate? We will learn this through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of the symbol of pregnancy in a dreamInterpretation of pregnancy in a dream for a manIf the dreamer is already single and sees this vision, it means that the dreamer is afraid of marriage and bears his responsibilities, and the dream expresses About his exposure to problems related to his emotional life. If the fortuneteller is a student, then this vision is nothing but a reflection of the state of fear and anxiety regarding the results of the test. In general, this vision indicates that there is a secret that the dreamer seeks to hide from those around him for fear of exposing himself to scandal if Someone discovered it. Seeing a pregnancy for a man also symbolizes the intense sadness he feels and tries to hide in front of those around him. Interpretation of pregnancy in a dream for a single woman. Imam Ibn Shaheen mentioned that if an unmarried girl dreams of being pregnant in her dream by a stranger and happiness overwhelms her in the dream, then the meaning of This dream boils down to kindness, living and lots of money. But if the dreamer sees that she is pregnant by a familiar person, then this vision is repulsive and indicates that she will face a major crisis in her life. If an unmarried woman sees that she is pregnant and gives birth in a dream, then this vision is one of the praiseworthy dreams for her, which indicates the end of the worries and problems that She suffers from it in reality. If an unmarried woman sees that she is pregnant with the one she loves in reality, then this vision means that she will marry him soon, and God knows best. This vision for a single person also symbolizes the purity of insight, the uprightness of his condition, and his commitment to obedience. Interpretation of pregnancy in a dream for a married woman: As for the meaning Pregnancy in a dream for a married woman is a reflection of the psychological pressure she is exposed to as a result of dealing with many problems. If a married woman becomes pregnant repeatedly in a dream and has not yet become pregnant, this vision expresses kindness and strength, as it indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. And the married woman That gave birth before, the meaning of this dream lies in goodness and abundance. Seeing pregnancy in males indicates that something bad will happen to the dreamer, while in the case of pregnancy in female twins, this vision indicates good nutrition, abundance and happiness. Interpretation of the appearance of pregnancy in a dream For a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream symbolizes the state of tension and anxiety that controls her fear of giving birth in reality. Seeing pregnancy in a pregnant woman’s dream without having

title: Interpretation of seeing beans in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing green beans: If anyone sees beans, this dream in his dream means that he will be able to overcome the problems he faces. Seeing an unmarried woman picking green beans in a dream, this vision indicates her close marriage to a good young man. If a married woman sees herself in a dream planting beans This indicates something bad will happen to her, and God knows best. Eating raw beans in a dream means family instability and many problems and arguments between family members. Interpretation of eating cooked beans with tomatoes for a married woman: If a married woman sees what she is doing cooking beans, then this dream in a dream means that he will hear good news, if he wishes. God. But if he saw that he was preparing them at home, this indicates imminent relief, relief of distress, and removal of worries. Seeing beans in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the arrival of goodness, abundant living, and a long life for the one who has the vision, and God knows best. This vision also indicates that the dreamer He will change his professional and social life for the better and earn a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about eating beans in a dream: If the dreamer sees that he eats raw beans, this indicates many consequences and crises that he suffers from. If the sleeper sees that he eats beans before cooking them, this means that this lustful person follows his whims and pleasures. If the dreamer eats beans, he will be harsh in the dream. This vision shows the weakness of the dreamer’s character, and God is the Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing raw beans in a dream symbolizes that he cannot solve the problems and crises he faces in his life. Interpretation of planting and harvesting beans at home in a dream. If the dreamer sees what he is doing planting beans inside the house. In a dream, this vision indicates the arrival of kindness and livelihood. Seeing in a dream that he is collecting beans means that the dreamer will achieve all his goals that he sought to achieve by God’s command. Seeing a married woman picking beans in a dream means that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. This vision also appears In a married man’s dream, God Almighty will provide him with righteous children, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing white beans for a dead person in a dream. If the sleeper sees white beans in a dream, this vision means that he will achieve his hopes and dreams that he seeks. But if a married woman sees white beans in her dream, this vision indicates To the arrival of kindness and adequate nutrition. Seeing a single girl eating white beans in a dream symbolizes that her life will change for the better, God willing. White beans may indicate to the dreamer that he will go through a difficult stage in his life in the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of cooking beans and eating them in a dream for a single woman if she dreams An unmarried woman is cooking beans, then this vision indicates that she will get married soon, God willing. But if she eats beans in her dream, this means that she will hear good news in the coming period. If she harvests green beans in a dream, this vision shows the fulfillment of desires and dreams, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. This vision symbolizes In the dream of an unmarried woman, it means a bright future full of joy and happy occasions

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the Day of Resurrection in a dream for a man and a woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection through the Hadot website and the books of major scholars on the interpretation of visions and dreams. The Day of Resurrection is the promised day in which we believe, and this is the end of the universe and the entire world. For some people, the dream of the Day of Resurrection was completed in a dream. Therefore, we have presented to you what is the interpretation of the vision on the Day of Resurrection. It is complete in a dream for the elderly, married and pregnant women, as well as for men. Interpretation of a vision in a dream on the Day of Resurrection by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin acknowledged and pointed out in his book “Interpretation of Dreams” that there is no difference between seeing a dream on the Day of Resurrection in a complete dream between a man and a woman, and no difference between a married man and a man. Married man. Ibn Sirin said that seeing the Day of Resurrection in a dream is complete evidence of victory and the satisfaction of a desire that was impossible to achieve, and victory if the dreamer does not pass the conditions and restrictions, and that victory inevitably approaches a god. He knows better. He stated in his book that if the straight and calculating pillar appears, he may be saved by the dream from a calamity that will harm him, and God knows best. Why do we dream of the Day of Resurrection? Some dream researchers disagree about the complete interpretation of the dream of the Day of Resurrection in a dream on the basis that this dream may not be common or It is a message and warning that the dreamer is committing a sin which will cause the wrath of God. God knows best. Some interpretation scholars said: Seeing the Day of Resurrection in a dream as a whole may be a dream that the person who had the vision has committed a crime, or it may be a feeling that offended someone, and this is a warning from God Almighty to repent. Return to someone other than God, and God knows best. Some scholars praise that seeing the Day of Resurrection in a dream is evidence of distance from God, and forgetfulness of the duties of prayer and the rights of God. Why does the Antichrist dream? Scientists and dream interpreters said that seeing the Antichrist in a dream is complete evidence of the presence of his enemies between man and his Lord, He must immediately return to God and correct what is between him and God Most High, and God knows best. The best. Interpretation scholars have also indicated that seeing the Antichrist in its entirety in a dream may mean the presence of lies and sorcery in the life of the dreamer, and seeing the Antichrist in a complete dream could be a disaster that will strike the city and could become. disaster. Devastation. His Lord forbids him and does not abandon his prayers and duties for the sake of his Lord Almighty, and his Lord knows best. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will respond to you.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman?

preview.html: Seeing dates in a dream for a married woman: Seeing dates seems confusing to many of us, and there is much evidence about it among jurists, and although there is a degree of disagreement among them, there is agreement on the desirability of this vision, and dates indicate goodness and abundance, a blessing, knowledge, and great benefits to seeing dates in a woman’s dream. A married woman with more details and explanations. Seeing dates in a dream for a married woman. Meetings in a dream represent activity, well-being, and psychological comfort, removing obstacles from her path, getting rid of life’s problems, and achieving a state of stability and calm. Taking dates indicates praise for her deeds, and the livelihood that undoubtedly comes to her. Eating dates It indicates kindness and generosity in provision and opening the doors of relief, and distributing dates symbolizes charity to the poor and benefiting from that. And if you see that she is taking dates from a dead person, this indicates her destined provision, and it comes to her at the appropriate time, and giving dates to the deceased indicates mercy and seeking forgiveness for him. It indicates Giving a date to someone you know indicates a benefit derived from him and it may be valuable knowledge or advice. Seeing a date in a dream for the married wife of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin sees dates as praiseworthy, an indication of money, a lot or a little, and a symbol of goodness, abundance, and abundance of blessings. Dates indicate the benefit that he receives. The fortuneteller, good dates are better than bad dates, and good dates symbolize insight, guidance, knowledge, wisdom, and the achievement of goals and objectives. And if you see that he is weighing dates, this is great spoils that he will obtain soon, and if you see that he is feeding others with dates, this indicates that you will benefit from those who feed him, but they eat Rotten dates. It is interpreted as a word of truth that means a lie. Dry dates symbolize a little sustenance sufficient for her need, and eating dates is evidence of reward or reward for the type and value of the work. Seeing an appointment in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing an appointment for a pregnant woman is an indication of achieving the goal, and enjoying luxury and vitality. And safety, rising from the sick bed, completing her pregnancy without pain or complications, and escaping distress. And if she sees that she is picking dates, this indicates the arrival of her child without diseases or deformities, and she may give birth to a boy or a blessed boy. Picking dates symbolizes flexibility in overcoming obstacles and intelligence in Managing her life issues. The gift of dates is a testimony to the care and attention she received from her family and relatives, in addition to her achieving stability and reassurance. Seeing yourself buying dates in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin believes that buying dates for a married woman indicates honesty, skill in work, blessings in her life, and a halal diet. If he sees The dreamer is buying many dates, then this indicates hard work and effort to earn money, start projects that will benefit her, or enter into an exchange that will bring great benefit. If the price of the dates is expensive, then this is the zakat that she pays voluntarily, and buying dates also indicates trade that does not It is a loss in it, and it is a mother’s trade with her Lord and honesty

title: Interpretation of a hedgehog in a dream by Ibn Sirin: good or bad news?

preview.html: Interpretation of a hedgehog in a dream is presented in this article. Interpretation of a hedgehog in a dream: The hedgehog is a small animal that belongs to mammals, because the female of this animal gives birth and feeds her young by caring for them. This animal is characterized by the presence of legs, a short neck, a small mouth, and small ears, and its back contains thousands of thorns that it uses to protect itself. From enemies and seeing this animal is one of the strange visions that many are searching for an explanation, and we will explain this through the following lines from the encyclopedia. The scholar Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a hedgehog in a dream indicates that there is someone planning to harm the fortuneteller and destroy his life with magic. This dream also indicates That its owner possesses many weapons. Another interpretation of this vision is that it indicates that the dreamer meets a person whose only goal is to collect money and prefers to isolate himself from people. The thorns of a hedgehog in a dream symbolize the dreamer panting after his desires. One of the well-interpreted visions is a dream of a simple sting from thorns. the Hedgehog. title: The meaning of changing one's name in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of changing a name in a dreamIf you want to know what is interpreted through us, we will learn in the article about the consequences of seeing a name change in a dream. The meaning of changing a name in a dream According to the opinions of interpreters, a person who dreams of a name different from his own indicates the presence of bad qualities in him. And if If the name in the dream is sweeter than his own, then this is evidence of his status and high status. Seeing a child’s name in a dream We will find out what is the interpretation of seeing a child’s name in a dream as follows: The person who dreams that he is naming the newborn, then this is a sign of kindness and a lot of nourishment. The unmarried woman who She sees in her dream that she is naming the birth, then this indicates her imminent marriage and God will bless her with the pregnancy and give her child the same name that she mentioned in the dream. A person is suffering from many pressures and problems and dreams of touching the child, this is evidence of getting rid of his problems and sorrows. Watching writing the name on a piece of paper does it indicate Seeing writing one's name in a dream to something specific? We will find out the following:Dream interpreters see paper and pen during pregnancy as evidence of ease and comfort. When someone signs a piece of paper in a dream, this indicates the imminent marriage of that person. A person who writes names on a completely blank sheet of paper is evidence of his victory. With a great status. A dream with a name printed is a sign of the emergence of great benefits for the dreamer. Seeing the name written in Hebrew is a sign that the person has committed sins. A single woman who dreams of having her name written is evidence that she will soon get married or take a new job. The dreamer who has not He receives his inheritance and signed a white paper with some people as evidence that he obtained his inheritance. A dream about changing a married woman’s name. We will learn about the meaning of changing a name in a dream for a married woman as follows: A married woman who dreams of changing her name to a name she likes in a dream is evidence that her situation has changed. For the better. Whereas if she dreams of changing a name that is worse than her own, this indicates that she will be exposed to many problems and fears. For a married woman to see a newborn named is a sign of a lot of goodness and nourishment, because seeing a newborn in a dream is good skin. Interpretation of changing the name in Dream by Ibn Sirin: Dreaming about changing one’s name in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, is evidence of the monarch’s dignity, blessing, and livelihood. Seeing a name changed in a dream to one of God’s beautiful names is a sign of victory over one’s enemies. Interpretation of a dream about my name written in a dream. Is it seeing my name written in a dream? Does it have any connotations? Together we get the answer as follows: An unmarried woman who sees her name beautifully written in a dream is evidence that she is marrying a person who previously admired her. To dream that you are writing in English is a sign of promotion at work. A married woman who has a child She saw his name written on a piece of paper in a dream indicating that this child will receive a lot of kindness and nourishment. A husband dreaming of writing his wife’s name in Hebrew in a beautiful way shows the presence of love and affection.

title: Interpretation of seeing God’s name pronounced in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the pronunciation of the name of God in a dream If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is pronouncing the name of God Almighty, this dream indicates that the dreamer will hear and give good news. This vision also appears in the dreamer's dream that the dreamer will return to God Almighty and then repent to Him, and God knows best. As for seeing him mentioning God, this indicates the coming of goodness, abundance of livelihood, and abundance of money for the visionary in the coming period, God willing. But seeing the sleeper's greatness of the word means in his dream that the visionary will achieve all his goals that he was striving for by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing saying "Oh God" in a dream Seeing an unmarried girl saying in her dream "Oh God" indicates comfort and relief from distress and happiness for her and her family members. And if a married woman sees that she is hesitant to say "Oh God" in a dream, this dream indicates the end of worries and the resolution of crises, God willing. A pregnant woman's point of view She mentions God in her dream with an easy natural birth, and it also indicates the health of herself and her child, and God knows best. This vision also appears in a person's dream, he will reach a great position in the near future by the command of God Almighty. Seeing the greatest name of God in a dream Single woman To see a single girl, the greatest name of God in a dream, means joys, happy occasions and good news for the Lord. If he sees the name of God written, this dream indicates in the dream that he will overcome all the difficulties he faces. But if some people see her and then mention the name of God Almighty in the dream, then this dream is commendable and portends good. This vision in a girl's dream may indicate that she is known for her virtuous morals. It also symbolizes her good and kind behavior among people and the world's love for her. Seeing the name of God written in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman \ married The name of God in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness, abundant living and abundant money for the one who has a vision. If he sees the name of God written, then this vision is commendable. As it indicates marital happiness and family stability. This vision in her dream may indicate relief from distress and distress after the end of worry and sadness and the arrival of happiness to the wife's home. Frequent supplication and repeated mention of the name of God in a married woman's dream indicates a feeling of security and psychological comfort, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Mentioning the name of God in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman remembers the objectivity of God in her dream It indicates the ease of childbirth and natural birth for her and her child, God willing. As for if she sees this vision, it indicates her good conduct, good behavior, and good conduct, and God knows best. Seeing God in a dream can mean that she will achieve all her hopes and dreams that she was trying to achieve. If she sees herself mentioning the name of God in her dream, this means that she will give birth to a disabled child and will obtain a high position in the future. Seeing the name of God the Greatest in the final dream If a divorced woman sees the name of God the Greatest in her dream, this dream indicates that she will hear good news in the coming period. Seeing the widow the name of God This dream in a dream indicates that he will overcome all the problems and crises that he faces, God willing. As for if she sees the name of God mentioned in a solution
